article_title: China Bribery Probe, Dismal Advair Sales Leave Glaxo Shares Gasping

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: British drug giant GlaxoSmithkline (GSK) this morning slashed its earnings expectations for the year, citing currency fluctuations and deteriorating sales of its respiratory drug Advair, particularly in light of moves in the U.S. by insurers unwilling to pay for the more expensive brand name. The price of Glaxo's shares dipped by [...]
